messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Vote Liberal Democrat on Thursday for a better future for the Western Isles.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will create thousands of new jobs with investment in the green energy and infrastructure.
Cancel plans to cut £20 billion from the Scottish health budget.
Support young people with smaller classes by banning all but essential paperwork for teachers.
Create a rural fuel discount to help keep down the cost of living.
Rebalance our political system to make it more fair and democratic.

issues.economy: We will create thousands of new jobs with investment in the green energy and infrastructure.
issues.education: Support young people with smaller classes by banning all but essential paperwork for teachers.
issues.environment: Create a rural fuel discount to help keep down the cost of living.
issues.governance: Rebalance our political system to make it more fair and democratic.
issues.health: Cancel plans to cut £20 billion from the Scottish health budget.

quotes.text: Vote Liberal Democrat on Thursday for a better future for the Western Isles.

images.caption: Jean Davis - Candidate for Nah-Eileanan an Iar
